'''Fisherman's Delicacy''' is a [[Furnishing]] item that can be used in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

The blueprint for Fisherman's Delicacy is obtainable from a [[Remarkable Chest]] in [[Sumeru]].

==How to Obtain==
Obtained from a Remarkable Chest in a tree hollow in [[Apam Woods]]. It can only be opened when it is not raining.
